title: Vibrant Seniors Events Black Los Angeles Tour #2
desc: Vibrant Seniors Events proudly presents the second of three Black Los Angeles Tours!?We will visit the African American Firefighter Museum, the first and only freestanding African American Firefighter Museum in the United States, along with other cultural gems highlighting the beauty of Black Los Angeles. Roundtrip transportation and a donation to the museum is included. Rite Aide Altadena  ( map ) ? 735 E. Altadena Dr., Altadena 8:00 a.m. departure & 4:30 p.m. return Please note:  Lunch and drinks are not included in the price of the tour.? Refund policy : No refunds will be issued after February 1, 2016. Additional questions?  Email us at? info@vibrantseniorsevents.com ?or call us at (626) 485-2342.
